subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The jury is still out on Celtics Coach Brad Stevens, but if his first two seasons in Boston are any indication, he at least has the even temperament to have a sustained N.B.A. career.
snippet: The jury is still out on Celtics Coach Brad Stevens, but if his first two seasons in Boston are any indication, he at least has the even temperament to have a sustained N.B.A. career.
